words.ex: It was naive of him to trust the offer without checking the details.

The nascent industry is expected to grow rapidly.
Despite the naysayers, the project turned out to be a success.

The situation necessitates immediate action.
The police uncovered a nefarious plot.
One mistake does not negate all your progress.

They negotiated a fair agreement for both sides.
Procrastination proved to be his academic nemesis.
Even as a neophyte, she showed remarkable talent.
The company faced accusations of nepotism in hiring.
They found a profitable niche in the market.

The dancer’s nimble movements impressed the audience.
He tends to nitpick even the smallest mistakes.
Owls are known for their nocturnal habits.
They lived a nomadic lifestyle for several years.
The fee was only nominal and easy to afford.
